Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK® 2 Gram Positive Erythromycin for Streptococcus pneumoniae
VITEK 2 AST-GP Erythromycin for Streptococcus pneumoniae
Regulation Name(s): Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test System - Short Incubation
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated quantitative or qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 Gram Positive Erythromycin susceptibility test for Streptococcus pneumoniae using automated and compact systems
Indications for Use Summary: Automated qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus pneumoniae isolates with VITEK 2 Systems, including addition of intermediate interpretive criteria for erythromycin
